Why is Gove using private email for business - has he got something to hide? http://monki.biz/1k | Kabads - musings, mutterings and murmerings

Why is Gove using private email for business - has he got something to hide? http://monki.biz/1k

He's using private email to try and cover his tracks. He currently believes that by using his private email system, any requests under Freedom of Information, will be refused. 

Does this mean that he has something to hide? What kind of discussions are going on between Gove and his department officials? I would be interested to find out.
